lead_paragraph: STEINBERG--Ethel Bookhalter, 97, on January 12, 2016. Born in Winnipeg, Manitoba and died in New York City. An independent woman ahead of her time, she was a Captain in the Canadian Army, and then a pediatrician serving the children of the New York City area. She shared her love of reading with her family and then as a volunteer with the New York City Public Schools. Survived by Herman, her devoted husband of 65 years, daughters Susan, Judith (Howard), Leslie, and Joan, grandchildren Aaron (Jillanne), Anne, David, Paul (Naeha), Rachel (Christopher), and Nathan, and great-grandchildren Thomas and Leena. All who knew her will remember her for her vitality. Gifts may be made in her memory to the New York Public Library. Service on Thursday, January 14 at 1pm at Star of David Funeral Home, 1240 Wellwood Avenue, West Babylon, NY. For more information: jewish-funeral-home.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STEINBERG, ETHEL BOOKHALTER
